name: 2022 21th International Symposium on Communications and Information Technologies
content: Publication: All accepted papers must be written in English and will be published into conference proceedings by IEEE. The proceedings will be submitted and reviewed by the IEEE Xplore and Ei Compendex after the conference. ISCIT 2022 is listed in IEEE official conference calendar: https://conferences.ieee.org/conferences\_events/conferences/conferencedetails/55906
